org.phantomapi.wraith

Interface Wraith

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhantomWraith

    public interface Wraith
    Represents a wraith npc
    Author:
    cyberpwn

      • isProtected

        boolean isProtected()
        Is the entity protected from outside interaction that would damage move or change the wraith's state
        Returns:
        true if the npc is able to be changed from players and the world

      • setProtected

        void setProtected(boolean protect)
        Set the wraith's protection status.
        Parameters:
        protect - if set to true, the npc will not take damage or be moved by outside physical forces
